briefdescription.para: Bring to front when focused flag.
Bring to back when defocused flag.
Sort children according to priority flag.
Last SetEnabled flag before any SetDeepEnabled.
Resize nesting level to prevent multiple events and endless loop.
Layout update nesting level to prevent endless loop.
Layout element maximum size in layout direction.
Indent spacing (number of pixels per indentation level).
Parent's minimum size calculated by layout. Used internally.
Use min/max anchor & min/max offset for position & size instead of setting explicitly.
Derived color. Only valid when no gradient.
Derived color dirty flag (only used when no gradient).
Flag whether node should send child added / removed events by itself.
Apply attribute changes that can not be applied immediately.
Load from XML data. Return true if successful.
Load from XML data with style. Return true if successful.
Create a child by loading from XML data with style. Returns the child element if successful, null if otherwise.
Save as XML data. Return true if successful.
Return whether is visible and inside a scissor rectangle and should be rendered.

detaileddescription.para: Update and return screen position. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return UI rendering batches for debug draw.

briefdescription.para: React to a mouse drag cancel event (ie, when an extra button is pressed).
React to drag and drop test. Return true to signal that the drop is acceptable.
React to drag and drop finish. Return true to signal that the drop was accepted.
Convert screen coordinates to element coordinates.
Convert element coordinates to screen coordinates.
Return whether the element could handle wheel input.
Load from an XML file. Return true if successful.
Save to an XML file. Return true if successful.

detaileddescription.para: Set name. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set position. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set size. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set width only. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set height only. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set minimum size. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set minimum width. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set minimum height. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum size. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum width. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum height. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set horizontal alignment. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set vertical alignment. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Enable automatic positioning & sizing of the element relative to its parent using min/max anchor and min/max offset. Default false. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set minimum (top left) anchor in relation to the parent element (from 0 to 1). No effect when anchor is not enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum (bottom right) anchor in relation to the parent element (from 0 to 1). No effect when anchor is not enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set offset of element's top left from the minimum anchor in pixels. No effect when anchor is not enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set offset of element's bottom right from the maximum anchor in pixels. No effect when anchor is not enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set pivot relative to element's size (from 0 to 1, where 0.5 is center). Overrides horizontal & vertical alignment. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set pivot relative to element's size (from 0 to 1, where 0.5 is center). Overrides horizontal & vertical alignment.

detaileddescription.para: Set child element clipping border. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set color on all corners. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set color on one corner. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_colors
Set priority. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set opacity. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether should be brought to front when focused. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether should be put to background when another element is focused. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether should clip child elements. Default false. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether should sort child elements according to priority. Default true. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether parent elements' opacity affects opacity. Default true. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether reacts to input. Default false, but is enabled by subclasses if applicable. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set enabled state on self and child elements. Elements' own enabled state is remembered (IsEnabledSelf) and can be restored.
Reset enabled state to the element's remembered state prior to calling SetDeepEnabled.
Set enabled state on self and child elements. Unlike SetDeepEnabled this does not remember the elements' own enabled state, but overwrites it.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether value is editable through input. Not applicable to all elements. Default true. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether is focused. Only one element can be focused at a time. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set selected mode. Actual meaning is element dependent, for example constant hover or pressed effect. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether is visible. Visibility propagates to child elements. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set focus mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set drag and drop flags. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set style from an XML file. Find the style element by name. If the style file is not explicitly provided, use the default style from parental chain. Return true if the style is applied successfully. See also UI_Programmatic.
Set style from an XML element. Return true if the style is applied successfully.

Set style from an XML file. Find the style element automatically by using the element's typename. If the style file is not explicitly provided, use the default style from parental chain. Return true if the style is applied successfully. See also UI_Programmatic.

detaileddescription.para: Set default style file for later use by children elements. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set layout mode only. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set layout spacing. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set layout border. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set layout flex scale. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set horizontal indentation. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set indent spacing (number of pixels per indentation level). BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Manually update layout. Should not be necessary in most cases, but is provided for completeness.
Disable automatic layout update. Should only be used if there are performance problems.
Create and add a child element and return it.
Insert a child element into a specific position in the child list.
Remove a child element. Starting search at specified index if provided.
Remove a child element at index.
Remove from the parent element. If no other shared pointer references exist, causes immediate deletion.
Find child index. Return M_MAX_UNSIGNED if not found.
Set parent element. Same as parent->InsertChild(index, this).

detaileddescription.para: Mark as internally (programmatically) created. Used when an element composes itself out of child elements. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Set traversal mode for rendering. The default traversal mode is TM_BREADTH_FIRST for non-root element. Root element should be set to TM_DEPTH_FIRST to avoid artifacts during rendering. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Set element event sender flag. When child element is added or deleted, the event would be sent using UIElement found in the parental chain having this flag set. If not set, the event is sent using UI's root as per normal. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set tags. Old tags are overwritten.
Add tags with the specified separator (; by default).
Remove specific tag. Return true if existed.
Template version of creating a child element.
Template version of returning child element by index using static cast.
Template version of returning child element by name using static cast.

memberdef.argsstring: (const StringHash &key, const Variant &value=Variant::EMPTY, bool recursive=false) const
memberdef.name: GetChildStaticCast

briefdescription.para: Template version of returning child element by variable using static cast. If only key is provided, return the first child having the matching variable key. If value is also provided then the actual variable value would also be checked against.
Template version of returning child element by index using dynamic cast. May return 0 when casting failed.
Template version of returning child element by name using dynamic cast. May return 0 when casting failed.

memberdef.argsstring: (const StringHash &key, const Variant &value=Variant::EMPTY, bool recursive=false) const
memberdef.name: GetChildDynamicCast

briefdescription.para: Template version of returning child element by variable. If only key is provided, return the first child having the matching variable key. If value is also provided then the actual variable value would also be checked against using dynamic cast. May return 0 when casting failed.

Return whether should be put to background when another element is focused. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Returns the element's last own enabled state. May be different than the value returned by IsEnabled when SetDeepEnabled has been used. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether value is editable through input. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
